title: Tree health management
brief_description: This program discusses the recognition and treatment of trees that are a potential threat to property and personal safety. Program consists of three modules: Module 1. Trees: friend or foe — Module 2. The hidden nature of tree defects: sealing rather than healing — Module 3. Recognising and evaluating potential hazard trees.
